item.description: Join Us Thursday nights 8 to 11pm at the Miyako Restaurant in Danvers MA. Love, Dance and Party to the great tunes of the Tom Pittman Band. The fusion club mix is hot and really makes for a lot of fun on and of the dance floor. The Asian foods and exotic drinks are always a pleasure, just right. No cover charge and if you come early we may go over a few new dance steps before the music starts. Bring your friends and maybe meet that special new dance partner.
item.name: North Shore "Singles" Dance and Party Social
